attributes.action: Require political parties running election campaigns to match spending with donations to charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All political parties should be required to donate 50% of their campaign funding to charities. This would ensure that less money is wasted on advertising and promotion of candidates and parties during election campaigns. 

Party fundraisers are very effective - this change would ensure that their work benefits the wider community.

National Lottery Distribution Fund to dispense money.
